invocations.description: Returns true if channel with name channelname is opened and false otherwise. The channel name must be provided exactly as it appears in the client (ex: 'Bubble's private...').
invocations.ex:
if not ischannel('NPCs') then
	say('hi')
else
	npcsay('hi')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will say 'hi' in the NPCs channel if it's open, if not, it will say it in the 'Default Channel'.
